title: Search Me Up
description: A full-stack web-based networking and job application platform for users to showcase their skills and experience.

title: CleanCycle
description: CleanCycle is a mobile application designed to address the pressing issue of environmental pollution and promote recycling to protect the environment. It serves as a platform for individuals and companies to actively participate in waste management efforts and contribute to a cleaner and more sustainable planet. It also offers a learning center to enlighten the public on environmental facts and correct misconceptions.

title: Mini-Survey Monkey
description: A survey application that allows users to create and respond to surveys, and surveyors to analyze and visualize survey data with features like graphs and charts.
